newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH PX50 FALLS LED BY HIGH CAPS AT FIXING.
newsitem.headline: CZECH PX50 FALLS LED BY HIGH CAPS AT FIXING.

text.p: The Czech PX50 moved in familiar fashion at Tuesday's price fixing with the top three major issues pulling the index lower ahead of releasing their first quarter (Q1) results later this week.
SPT Telecom, which will release Q1 results on Wednesday at 0900 GMT, dropped five crowns to 3,300.
Komercni Banka , whose Q1 results are to be announced at 0800 GMT on Wednesday, fell 10 crowns to 2,240 and CEZ , whose results will be released on Friday at 0800 GMT, fell 31 crowns to 970.
In the broader market, the biggest decliner was conference organiser BVV Brno which fell 139 crowns to 2,650.
